panels.content: Welcome to the unichain monitor site!

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "statsd_bc1__write_transaction_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "statsd_bc2__write_transaction_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Cluster

targets.query: SELECT mean("value")*2 FROM "cpu_value" WHERE "host" = 'bc1' AND ("type_instance" = 'system' or "type_instance" = 'user') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
